channel.title: Comments on: Changing My Workouts A Bit
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: You can't buy health, so... there is no other way. Good Luck!
item.content:encoded: You can’t buy health, so… there is no other way. Good Luck!

item.title: By: Shai

item.description: Good Luck. Keep up the good work.
item.content:encoded:
Good Luck.
Keep up the good work.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Since you wanted us to wish you luck, I was wondering if saying "break a leg" would be a cliché. Then I found this web site: http://www.westegg.com/cliche/
So now you can tell the 'walking' people "if you can't run with the big dogs, stay on the porch".
item.content:encoded:
Since you wanted us to wish you luck, I was wondering if saying “break a leg” would be a cliché. Then I found this web site:
http://www.westegg.com/cliche/

So now you can tell the ‘walking’ people “if you can’t run with the big dogs, stay on the porch”.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: You remind me that when I started (walking for 45 minutes at 5.5 km/h) I felt the same with regards to the people who were running on treadmills beside me. Slowly but surely I reached the current level and while I know I'm doing very well, my fear is that one day I'll just quit and go back to being a chubby, lazy guy.
item.content:encoded: You remind me that when I started (walking for 45 minutes at 5.5 km/h) I felt the same with regards to the people who were running on treadmills beside me. Slowly but surely I reached the current level and while I know I’m doing very well, my fear is that one day I’ll just quit and go back to being a chubby, lazy guy.

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Wow. Compared to this i'm not exercising at all :(
item.content:encoded: Wow. Compared to this i’m not exercising at all :(
